name: Circleduck
description:
Circleduck is my Entry for Taku's Mini Jam.

In Circleduck you have a fishing pole and have to catch rubberducks with it, in order to advance to the next level.

Every asset (Sprites, Sounds, Music) and every line of code in this game was done by myself during the time of the gamejam.

Play Fullscreen and 16:9 for best experience

Controls:

A  /  Left Arrow - Turn Left
D / Right Arrow - Turn Right
Space (hold) - Increase Power
Space (release) - Throw
ESC - Pause
M - Mute Music

Thank you for playing!
